DOC.brief_summary: Testing of a dual tuned proton/fluorine MRI radio frequency coil Images were collected from plastic fluorine phantoms taped to the upper thigh of health volunteers. This trial was performed as part of an application for a Health Canada Investigational Device Exemption (Protocol # 226949)
DOC.brief_title: Testing of Radiofrequency Coil for Clinical 19F MRI
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteer MRI incompatible patient claustrophobia
